text: Edward Furlong (born August 2, 1977) is an American actor. He began working as an actor in 1991. He played John Connor in Terminator 2: Judgment Day. He played Hawk in Detroit Rock City. His other movies include Before and After, American History X and Brainscan. Furlong was born in Glendale, California. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glendale, California Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Edward Furlong
